Release Notes 1.3

New Features

  • Multiline Window Titles: New toggle in settings to make window titles multiline by hiding the app name.
  • Improved Focus Behavior: Keyboard focus now consistently follows window switches.
  • Enhanced Hover Behavior: Cursor hovering now aligns with default macOS app switcher behavior.
  • Quick Search Updates:
    • Default keybind changed to CMD+SHIFT+K to reduce conflicts
    • Added option to disable quick search completely
  • Navigation Improvements:
    • New animations when reaching scroll limits
    • Added backward navigation using ` key (above tab)

Bug Fixes

  • Resolved Safari full screen tab tracking issues
  • Improved Traditional Chinese language support
  • Improved window toggling across different desktops
  • Various stability improvements and bug fixes
